item.title: Remote Work
item.description: Some of us have been forced by the pandemic to work in a new reality. Even though forced work from home != remote work, I would like to reinforce some practices that are in place in some well-known companies with distributed teams. Acknowledgments: This page would not be possible without the collaboration and discussions with Nuno Santos, Silvia Bessa and Ana Rebelo Setup Chat Slack, Discord Video Conference Google Meets, Zoom
